paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information specifically for the BRCA2 gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In 1/21 (4.8%) patient we identified a novel missense variant in BRCA2, c.9541A > T (p.Met3181Leu).

functional_data.summary: In silico analysis predicted c.9541A>T (p.Met3181Leu) as tolerated in three classifier algorithms.

variants.segregation_data: All tested relatives affected with cancer displayed the pathogenic variant.
variants.additional_notes: This variant was identified in a patient with endometrial cancer.
key_quotes: In 1/21 (4.8%) patient we identified a novel missense variant in BRCA2, c.9541A > T (p.Met3181Leu).

individual_records.evidence_sentence: 1/21 (4.8%) patient report 1 variant of unknown significance (UV), c.599 C > T (p.T200I), in BRCA2.

variants.additional_notes: This variant is classified as a variant of unknown significance.
key_quotes: 1/21 (4.8%) patient report 1 variant of unknown significance (UV), c.599 C > T (p.T200I), in BRCA2.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data extracted from the main text.
